title: MBMBaM 601: Sherlock Holmes and the Mystery of the Perfect Beach Body
description:
This episode gave us some real STANDING energy. Sometimes you just gotta talk down to the mic to let it know who’s boss.

Suggested talking points: The Dungeon’s Inside the Dragon, Dong Quixote, Noodle Limpington II, Get Out of Bit Free Card, Sexy Texys, Pop Your Bones in There

The National Asian Pacific American Women’s Forum: https://www.napawf.org/about
Harmony House: https://harmonyhousewv.com/
author: shows@mbmbam.com (Griffin McElroy, Justin McElroy, Travis McElroy)
